items.sentence: I've already told Tom that I don't want him to do that.
I wish that I could speak French as fluently as you do.
Tom is wearing the same clothes that he wore yesterday.
Please write me a letter whenever you run into trouble.
People can easily start loving, but not so easily stop.
Let me know in advance when you're coming to Australia.
If I were you, I would quit my job and leave Australia.
I've been living in Australia for the past three years.
I can't believe that Tom is really planning to do this.
I can't believe that you did all this without any help.
